Articles.Content:
hello fellow kerbonauts

i've been toying around with ksp from time to time (demo), but never put much thought or time in it. then i started reading here and watching scott manley (thank you!) and realised that it's about time to give this another try, bought the game and am quite addicted already! ;-)

i made some screenshots of what i'm up to at the moment, i hope i embed them the way i should, if not, please tell me! i have never participated in a forum before, so i'm bound to make some mistakes! ;-)

launch escape system MKI

my first "real" space station

my first "real" space station

launch of the escape-pods

Edited October 10, 2013 by Luegg

Welcome to the forums! And read this => http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/36010-Introducing-the-Ability-to-Embed-Imgur-Albums%21 for your Imgur worries.

Anyway you've done this and, I haven't even got to Duna yet
thank you, scorpi15! tried it, but i think it looks nicer with the pictures as it is now!
